thread.section_title: Phoneshop Beoordelingen | Beoordelingen van Phoneshop | www.phoneshop.nl
thread.title: MOHAMMAD Mozaffari Foumashi
thread.title_full: Phoneshop Beoordeeld door MOHAMMAD Mozaffari Foumashi

author: MOHAMMAD Mozaffari Foumashi
title: MOHAMMAD Mozaffari Foumashi
text:
Please, please, never trust them, never buy a smartphone from them.
I bought a galaxy note from their shop, they send it to me via post.nl
The LCD was broken (not really broken, but the pen was not working properly)
I asked them to change it, or refund me the price.
The answer: contact our repair shop and we will repair it in 3 weeks!! I bought a new one, and they want to give me a refurbished phone!!!
Of course I contacted my lawyer and will legally continue to reach an acceptable result/response!!
Never trust them, never buy a cellphone from them.
